name: Heritage 20-Gauge Vinyl Liner for 15' x 52" Round Pools

reviews.name: Heritage 20-Gauge Vinyl Liner for 15' x 52" Round Pools
reviews.reviewText:
The description of the liner in the advertisement kind of had us guessing. While we had a 15' round pool, the ad says, 15'-20'. The 20' simply refers to 20 gauge thickness.
We have a 42" deep pool and the 48"-52" wall liner did just fine. No wrinkles.
reviews.title: POOL LINER

reviews.name: Heritage 20-Gauge Vinyl Liner for 15' x 52" Round Pools
reviews.reviewText: I liked the fact that the liner was shipped to the store and that it fit just right.
reviews.title: Liner was good

reviews.name: Heritage 20-Gauge Vinyl Liner for 15' x 52" Round Pools
reviews.reviewText: This liner was purchased as a replacement. I am happy to say that it's just as thick and durable as the original. I'm glad I did not purchase a brand new pool like I intended too.
reviews.title: 06 May 2008

reviews.name: Heritage 20-Gauge Vinyl Liner for 15' x 52" Round Pools
reviews.reviewText:
Order processing and Shipping both ahead of schedule, Top Quality Product.
Just the right shade of blue, makes the pool look great. Even comes with the clips for the top(Flat ones).
Exelent Fit, Though the directions, basicly amount to (do not eat). Do alittle research on the web and the prodject will go just fine.
reviews.title: If The Liner Fits Ware it

reviews.name: Heritage 20-Gauge Vinyl Liner for 15' x 52" Round Pools
reviews.reviewText: Recommend to anyone. I do childcare from my home and have over 10 kids in it everyday! I'm convinced.
reviews.title: Twice as durable as a standard liner.
